name: Space Out (itch) (Lio Lim)
description:
Space Out is a fast-paced block-pushing puzzle game! Manage your space in cramped corridors, constantly on the move, navigating your way through Spaces Between. Collect weapons, stun aliens, and get out of the spaceship alive! Can you escape before time runs out?

Controls:  WASD or Arrow Keys to move, Space Bar to shoot. Mobile controls are on the screen.

Made over 1 semester for NM4260 Game Design in NUS.
Theme: Spaces Between
Restriction: make a 2D singleplayer game for both PC and mobile

A game by Liminal Studios 2022
Designed by Colin
Developed by Lio Lim
Art by Celine
QA Testing by Shaun

BGM by Lio Lim
SFX by Lio Lim and Kenney.nl https://kenney.nl/
